english.segment1: I think it's a cold, cold world and I think we need to heat it. light it up like gasoline when a match's thrown down in it. so go ahead and strike a match, a passionate heart is needed. so throw a torch up in the sky, 'cause we need someone to lead it
english.segment2: it only takes a little spark to get a fire goin'. I know the fire's in your heart, so go ahead and show it
english.segment3: (chorus). go - light it up - start a fire. burn - let it burn - even higher
english.segment4: like a city on a hill, we can light up the horizon. for miles and miles and miles - you can see the smoke is risin'. so go ahead and light the sky like a bonfire in the night. let the fire keep burnin' hard - it can never be too bright
